sentences.sContent: And for those who prefer a healthier diet there is also a hydroponic greenhouse where fresh vegetables will grow all year round.
sentences.sContent_eng: And for those who prefer a healthier diet there is also a hydroponic greenhouse where fresh vegetables will grow all year round.
sentences.sCn: 还为那些注意健康饮食者建造了温室，温室内熟菜用溶液培养，新鲜绿色食品一年四季络绎不绝。

words.tran: 水栽培，水耕法；[植] 溶液培养学
